column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////One of the best restaurants I have eaten in 2015! We got the place recommended and booked a table six weeks in advance and got a table only at 4:30 PM for dinner. It didn't matter
column2: it was already busy at this time. The service was professional and pleasant
column3: the interior is amazing. From the appetizer through to dessert
column4: everything was excellent. The taste is untraditional but not too crazy. Worth a visit!!
